stories.text:
I'm thinking of moving to Mountain View and I'm coming to stay for a few weeks to test the waters and check out the area before I make that larger decision.

A lot of the sites list what I assume are normal tourist traps but I'd like to maybe hear from some locals in terms of food and places to check out.

I like outdoors activities and basically anything food wise except seafood if that helps. Musically I enjoy basically any genre. Happy to check out art and theater as well even though I'm largely an idiot in that area.

Which is to say I'm largely open to most experiences if at least only once, so suggest away :)
stories.title: Ask HN: What are some things to do when visiting Mountain View?

stories.text:
Hey HN,

I'm Joe, the founder of Poddin - a fast, accurate podcast transcription tool.

http://Poddin.io

It's designed for podcasters to improve SEO and search engine visibility, and also to provide audience with the ability to "read" podcast in text.

Poddin also supports speaker detection to know who said what. It also supports filler words removal, so your transcribed text will no longer contain umm, uhhhh, you know, etc.

Any feedback is welcome, you can also find me on twitter @jomoh888
stories.title: I made a podcast transcription tool, looking for feedbacks
